_header: To you high worship and magnificence

BLHar3810.First Lines: To ȝou hye worschip & magnificencebe incresyng grace with prosperyte…
BLHar3810.Last Lines: …fare wele loue tyl we metefor þis tyme now my leve y take
BLHar3810.Editions:
Jordan,  Richard. 
             “Das ‘Trentalle Gregorii’ in der Handschrift Harley
                3810.” 
             Englische Studien
         40 (1909): 351-71: 265-6.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 198-200.
